title: Crocs and Gators
description: Crocs and Gators teaches students about the four types of crocodilians-their physical characteristics, habitats, and eating habits. The book also discusses why some crocodilians are becoming endangered and what is being done to save them.
highFrequencyWords: crocodile, endangered, fierce, reptiles, scaly, snouts
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
awareness: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
phonics: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
